data.name: zakon
data.detailed_description:
About the game

Zakon is an arcade-flight game with emphasis on fighting big monsters in a soviet cyberpunk city with city exploration in all 3 dimensions plus additional quests

GLORY TO THE MOTHERLAND

Dear soldier,
Because of your recent achievements against terrorists, your social score is high enough to give you the opportunity to be the first pilot of our new combat jet for special operations within the motherland.
Your duties, however, will not change. You have to keep the motherland safe and free out of betrayers.
Keep your social score high, spread the VOZD's voice across Krasnogorie and do not even think about committing anti-motherland actions. Doin so will cause your social credit to decrease immediately and you will be considered an enemy of the motherland.
VOZD - FATHER
MOTHERLAND - MOTHER



Features:
  • Fight big monsters in a high-density city
  • Fly a highly-maneuverable jet
  • Maintain your social score high enough to not become the enemy of motherland
  • Spread the VOZD's voice across the soviet-cyberpunk city
  • Find all upgrades in order to change the way you play
  • Retro PS1 inspired graphics

data.short_description: Dear soldier, Because of your recent achievements with terrorists, your social score is high enough to give you the opportunity to to be a first pilot of our new combat jet for special operations within the motherland. Keep us proud and don't let them move. GLORY TO VOZD!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
